author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Minister Jayalalithaa has ordered the release of water for irrigation from Veedur dam in Villupuram district from today.

Following representations from farmers in Villupuram district, she has ordered the release of water from Veedur dam and it would benefit over 3,200 acres, Ms. Jayalalithaa said in a statement.
title: Chief Minister orders water release from Veedur dam
